transcript:
Customer: Hello sir, vanakkam sir.
Executive: Vanakkam sir.
Customer: Sir, enga office pannittingala?
Executive: Sir, adhaan sir, andha enquiry thaan thirumbi irrelevant ah vandhave neraiya vandhutte irukku. Adha neenga reesolve pandra maari theriyala enaku.
Executive: Appadiya, oru second sir. Neenga call panningale.
Customer: Aama, andha number vandhu paathinga appidina enaku show aagathu. Idhellaam vandhu systematical number ingaradhunala. Enaku company name mattum oru rendu solla mudiyuma? Sorry.
Executive: OVSTP bros.
Customer: Marubadiyum irrelevant ah varadhingala sir?
Customer: Aama neraiya vandhuttu irukku sir. Thirumba thirumba appidi thaan vandhu. Thirumba ondra varusham ennala enquiry edukka mudiyala sir. Ellam enquiry.
Customer: Last oru meeting nadandhadhu illaiya?
Customer: Aama sir, adukaprom suthamaave varala enquiry. Edhukku meeting nadathuringa enaku onnum puriyala sir.
Customer: Sir, andha complaint raise panna piraguthaan enaku enquiry varadhinga sir.
Customer: Adukaprom paathinga neenga meeting eduthinga, sumachinga eduthingala edhukku eduthinga theriyala. Adhu reesolve aagala adhu enaku andha problem eh.
Executive: Okay, oru second sir. Last ondra maasam enoda performance idhu paarunga sir. Adhu onnume illing sir enaku. Avlavum enaku waste aayittu irukku. Ellam kaasu waste aayittu irukku.
Customer: Oru lead kooda edukkala.
Customer: 16, 15 maasathukku vaarathukku 42 lead naan eduthu vandhen. 45 lead pakkama.
Customer: Hello sir?
Executive: Ah, kekudhu kekudhu. Orey second sir, orey second naan eduthuttu irukka.
Customer: Lead onnu vandhurukku sir. Kolkatta la irundhu adhu paathingala?
Customer: Edhukku sir?
Executive: 2000 lead.
Customer: Puriyalainga.
Executive: Kolkatta la irundhu oru lead ketrukanga.
Customer: Ennadhu inga sir?
Executive: Wooden carving.
Customer: Sir, oru lead vidunga sir. Enaku thirumbi brass metal la vandhuttu irukku sir.
Executive: Illa wooden thaan sir vandhurukku. Ippo ippo wooden la paathuttu irukka.
Customer: Sir, naan call pannumbodhu edho oru leeda kaatti phone panni edho samalichu vechirreenga. Aana enaku reesolve aagura maari theriyalainga sir neenga.
Executive: Samalikkalaing sir naan edhume panna kidayadhu. Just open pannen. Open pannittu check pannadhula enaku adhula show aagudhu.
Customer: Sir, oru lead rendu thirumbi adha paarrunga sir. Brass naan naan thirumbi feedback koduthurukka adhu. Naatdin naatdin evlavo complaint idhu aayirukku paarrunga adhu. Feedback koduthurukka sir.
Customer: Thirumba thirumba adhe thaan neenga koduthuttu irukkinga adhu.
Executive: Illa sir ippo naan solradhu ungalukku wooden thaan sir vandhurukkuinga.
Customer: Puriyalainga sir unga voice eh kekkave illinga sir.
Executive: Kekkalaiya? Wooden wooden carving thaan vandhurukku ungalukku. Vera edhula varala.
Customer: Illainga sir edhukku brass metal thaan enaku kodukkuringa sir naan kekkaren naan.
Executive: Ungalukku brass metal edhum varalaingala ippo ellam stop aayi thaan irukku ungalukku. Ippo naan open panni.
Customer: Stop aayirukku sir naan ungalukku feedback koduthurukka paarrunga. Naan feedback kodukkadhu ungalukku varala naatdin andha complaint idhu maari pannunom la adhula poi paarrunga naan evlavo idhu ungalukku return pannirukka adhula poi paarrunga neenga.
Executive: Seri ippo naan current ah sollittu irukka sir neenga idhu varaikum koduthurukkinga naan illannu solla kidayadhu. Naan enna solren appidina ippo current ah sollittu irukka ippo current ah ungalukku show aaga koodiya leads ellame vandhu paathinga appidina wooden la thaan mark aayirukku. Wooden la thaan ungalukku leads eh kaattudhu. Seri ippo.
Customer: Current seri ippo pesumbodhu ippo varudhu ippo naethu varaikum enna solla poringa neenga adhu?
Executive: Sir naanga idhula edhume change pandradhu kidayadhu sir idhu ellame automatic ah neenga enna.
Customer: Illainga sir 45 illinga sir oru vaaram rendu vaaram irundhuchina parava illa diwali mudichittu namakku evlavo naal aachinga ippo. Namakku leads sariya varamaattadhu sollittu irukka enaku metal fiber la vandhuttu irukku sir adhu neenga adhai sariya panni kodunga automatic ah adhu vara aarambichirum enaku.
Executive: Seri ippo illa leads varalaingaringa illaiya ippo 15th annikki neenga rendu lead eduthurukkinga ok vaa resting ganesha wooden statue and detailed carving ganesha. Idhu idhu rendume vandhu 15th thedhi eduthurukkinga. Adukaprom 13th thedhi vandhu paathinga appidina wooden ganapathi statue again wooden elephant bracket. So adukaprom wooden ganapathi statue. So idhu ellame line ah thaan neenga eduthurukkinga. Idhula leads onnum varalaingaringa but aana ungalukku leads wooden vandhuttu thaan irukku neenga adhai consume pannittu thaan irukkinga. Neenga ennala adhai paakka mudiyudhungaradhuthaan naan solla varen.
Customer: Seri illinga sir pandren enaku ippo irukradhai irukradhai porukki pannittu irukka.
Customer: Porukki porukki pannittu irukka edho onnu varadhu oru lead la oru oru naalukku oru lead rendu lead vechu naan enna sir pandradhu adhai?
Executive: Illa neenga sir naan enna solren vaarathukke paathinga naama 45 lead irukkingala illaiya enaku?
Executive: Bonus oda serthukken.
Executive: Illa neenga solradhu enaku puriyudhinga naan enna solrenna ungalukku brass kaattradhu ungalukku vandhu vendaam adhai enaku stop pannunga sollringa. Ungalukku brass kaattradhu reason enna appidina brass related aana oru idhu show aaguradhukku reason enna appidina naama vandhu idhula vandhu generric aana keywords adhaavadhu generric aana categories map pannirukkom. Onnum illa ippo vandhu wooden related ah potrukka koodiya idhu ellaathukkume vandhuttu irukku. And adhu illama oru sila idhula vandhu paathinga normal statue potrukkom normal aana oru keyword ingaradhulaam add pannirukkom ingaradhunala thaan enna aagudhu appidina ippo statue la like neraiya vagaiyaana statue irukku like brass la irukku adhu wooden la irukku idhu maari vandhu neraiya neraiya divisions irukkingaradhunala ungalukku podhuvaa podradhu ellame show aagudhu. So naama enna pannirukkom appidina andha wooden ah mattum ippo prefer pannirukkom. Ippo wooden la irundhu thaan ungalukku maximum varudhu. Adhaiyum meeri ungalukku brass varudhu appidinaalume neenga idhula mark pannittu thaan irukkinga adhu engalalaiyum paakka mudiyudhu. So adhu maximum adhu varadhukkaana idhu vandhu ellame stop pannirlaam sir. Neenga ippo idhu prefer panni neenga last video meet nadandhadhukaprom idhu improve aayirukku. Ungalukku varakoodiya leads ellame improve aayirukku engalala adhai kannukooda paakka mudiyudhu. Last 20 leads ennala paakka mudiyudhu ellam full maximum wooden la irundhu thaan vandhurukku adhuve line ah day wise la ungalukku onnondrume vandhu prefer aayirukku.
Customer: Sir andha wooden varudhu sir thevaillaadha panel ta idhu idhu vera edhaavadhu varudhu adhu namakku sambandham illaadhadhum varudhu adhu. Wooden ah vitturunga adhai naan paathukkaren adhu onnum prachana illa bro wooden ah vitturunga. Naan kekkardhu brass fiber metal andha palar resin andha idhukulla kekkaren wooden la edhana related ah analyst la paathu onnum prachana illa. Naan paathukkaren.
Executive: Illa illa brass varudhu appidina adhu generric aana word ingaradhunala thaan ungalukku varudhu ippo example ku normal statue vume naama keyword ah koduthurukkom idhula irundhu ippo naan onnum illa sir oru client oruthanga ippo statue nu solli normal ah search pandraanga appidina andha statue la brass um kaattum wooden um kaattum adhukku related ah enna enna divisions irukko ellame kaattum ok vaa. Ippo andha client ku wooden la mattum thaan venum appidingumbodhu adhu subdivision la maari ungalukku leads ah kaamichirum. Ippo inga enna nadandhuttu irukku ungalukku enna problem appidina so generric aana keywords map aayirukkingaradhuthaan problem. Ippo neenga enna pannunga andha maari varakoodiya idhu vandhu just ignore pannirunga adhu deny pannirunga. Meedhi irukkakoodiya wooden la irukradhai mattum neenga consume pannunga.
Customer: Seri ignore naan ondra last ondra varushama pannittu irukka sir naan ignore pandradhu andha feedback date sonnadhula irundhu pannittu irukka sir. Naatdin naatdin kodunga solli adhai abuse panna aarambiche ippo aaru maasam aachu neenga solliye. Aana adhu solve aagura maari enaku theriyaliye adhuthaan naan kekkaren thirumba thirumba illa naan edhukku ungalukku naan kekka poren avlavo idhuva varanu.
Executive: Seri seri enaku puriyudhinga sir neenga innum extra vaa i mean innum nalla vandhu increase aaganum ingaradhai edhir paakkiringaradhula thappe kidayadhu. Naan ungalukku innoru vishayam solren ippo ippo correct ah vandhuttu irukku seriingala idhu edhume naama change panna vendaam. Ennaikku ippo ungalukku brass show aaguradhu thaan ungalukku problem ah irukku.
Customer: Illa brass vandhu illa sir metal um varudhu illa brass example ku sonnen metal um varudhu fiber um varudhu approm POP varudhu namakku idhellaam namakku thevaillaadhadhu thaan sir adhu. Wooden la edhu vandhaalum naan paathukkaren naan statue la naan edhu vandhaalum paathukkaren naan.
Executive: Seriinga seriinga illa idhukaprom adhu neenga naan maximum adhai naan konjam observation la thaan sir vechirukka ungakoodiya account ungalukku ippodhikku correct ah thaan vandhuttu irukkingara maari thaan engakku show aagudhu. So idhaiyum meeri.
Customer: Illa illa correct ah varalainga sir enaku varala naan adhu idhu refresh panni panni paakkaren edho onnu wall bracket varudhu namakku varudhu naama edukka mudiyamaattengudhu adhu onnu rendu thaan varudhu adhu adhai consume pandradhu vaarathukku 45 naan consume panni aavanum sir adhu appidi aagalanna kooda 30 aavadhu pannikkanum 30 25 aavadhu thandina parava illiye enaku.
Executive: Vaarathukku namakku 34 lead inga sir ungalukku maximum 34 leads vara maari like market la irukkumbodhu leads irukkumbodhu ungalukku show aaguramaari naan panni kodukka sir seriingala adhanala idhai idhu pannikka vendaam so ippodhikku correct ah slow la thaan sir irukku so brass varudhu appidina oru screenshot eduthu enaku anuppunga naan anuppi year podurengaati naan idhu ellaathaiyum naan sariya panni aavanum inga idhu naan june la thirumbi may la varudhu ninga renew la adhukulla sariyaachina paakkalaanga adhu naan renew pandrengaati ellaathukkum konjam sariya pannununga adhanala thaan naan last oru rendu naal kekkitte irukka renewel service upgrade pandradhu idhellaam second thing sir irukkura service innum proper ah eduthuttu poradhu thaan important namakku ippodhikku adhaan adutha renewel pandradhu kekkarenga sir konjam adhaan panni kodunga kekkarenga sir.
Executive: Sure sir.
Executive: So kandippa sir.
Customer: Seri ok thank you sir. Ok thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Irrelevant buyleads, especially brass and metal.

- Unable to extract leads and consume them.

- Leads not resolved even after raising complaints.

- Dissatisfied with current performance and wasted money.



Resolution:

- Executive stated leads are mostly wooden now.

- Suggested ignoring and denying irrelevant leads.

- Executive mentioned improvements after the video meet.

- Asked to send screenshots of brass leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send screenshots of brass leads.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, complaints, resolution, wooden, brass
